captions.text:
It's ÒBack and ForthÓ,
Elidio and Marcio.
What is your profession?

Car salesman. You work at
a car dealership, I suppose.

Here's how it works,
ladies and gentlemen:

Whenever I say 'forthÕ,
the scene goes forward.

Whenever I say ÔbackÕ,
the scene goes backward.

Just like that.
ÔCar salesmanÕ, you're on.
But I got three kids.

Look, if you have three kids,
you need a bigger car.

- Do you have something like a pick-up,
to fit the kids, the luggage... - Back!

Do you have like a pick-up,
to fit the kids, the luggage...

Look, you have three kids,
you need a bigger car.

- But I got three kids..
- Forth!
But I got three kids.

Look, if you have three kids,
you need a bigger car.

Do you have like a pick-up,
to fit the kids, the luggage...
Do you know the Kombi?
Kombi, the classic van?

- Yeah!
- Back!
Kombi, the classic van?

- Do you know the Kombi?
- Forth!

- Do you know the Kombi?
- Kombi, the classic van?

Yes, classic, because it
ÔkombiÕ used by everybody.
Back!

Yes, classic, because it
'kombiÕ used by everybody!

- Kombi, the classic van?
- Do you know the Kombi?

Do you have like a
pick-up truck, to fit the kids...

If you have three kids,
you need a bigger car.

- Yeah, but I got three kids.
- Forth!

- But I got three kids. - If you have
three kids, you need a bigger car.

Do you have like a pick-up,
to fit the kids, the luggage...
Do you know the Kombi?
Kombi, the classic van!

Classic, because it ÔkombiÕ
used by everybody!
Back!

Classic, because it ÔkombiÕ
used by everybody!

- Kombi, the classic van?
- Do you know the Kombi?

- Forth!
- Do you know the Kombi?
Kombi, the classic van?

Classic, because it ÔkombiÕ
used by everybody!
We also have the Cherokee!
Cherokee...?
Back!
Cherokee...?
We also have the Cherokee!

Kombi, the classic, because it
'kombiÕ used by everybody!
Forth!

Kombi, the classic, because it
ÔkombiÕ used by everybody!

- I...
- We also have the Cherokee!

- Cherokee...?
- It's sweet as a cherry kiss...
If I could give you all an advice...

Go home... Maybe you can still
watch something on the TV.

Sorry, folks,
it will get better, okay?

CIA. BARBIXAS DE HUMOR
presented

IMPROVÁVEL
Probably a good show.
